markdownRemark.html:
I have been trying out Substack. In short, it is a subscription email newsletter/blog service that enables you to write and publish newsletter quickly, easily and charge for them if you like. They are also busy experimenting with delivering podcasts too.

Thoughts:

  • The editor is clean and minimal and I like it.
  • There not being a "Saves as Draft" button is weird and confusing.
  • The customisation options are limited, but considering this is a beta and MVP, understood.
  • Are there RSS feeds? I am not sure...
  • The editor does not make it obvious how to add the various social media embeds.
